definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
Matteo Ricci (1552-1610), Jesuit missionary and translator in Ming China/erroneous spelling of 利瑪竇|利玛窦

sentences.chinese: 我的目的地是祕魯利馬。

sentences.english: Casa Andina Select Miraflores is the ideal luxury Lima hotel choice.
sentences.chinese: 安第斯選擇米拉弗洛雷斯是理想選擇利馬豪華酒店。

sentences.english: The Organisation of American States convened in Lima for its annual meeting.
sentences.chinese: 美洲國家組織在利馬召開了年會。

sentences.english: These five images are in his Lima Series.
sentences.chinese: 這五福作品選自他的“利馬系列”。

sentences.english: Montgomery urged his troops to knock Rommel for six out of Africa.
sentences.chinese: 蒙哥利馬激勵他的軍隊痛擊隆美爾，把他趕出非洲。

sentences.english: He came from the Judean town of Arimathea and he was waiting for the kingdom of God.
sentences.chinese: 他本是猶太亞利馬太城裏素常盼望神國的人。

sentences.english: Pina Gallimard reverie together, be able to extricate themselves in the one-way thinking Orientalism.
sentences.chinese: 加利馬爾遐想聯翩，無法自拔於東方主義的單向思維。

sentences.english: The race was a 150-yard dash through the capital of Lima.
sentences.chinese: 本次賽跑路程150碼，直達祕魯首都利馬。

sentences.english: These are the album's liner notes written by maestro Carlos Barbosa Lima.
sentences.chinese: 這是專輯的班輪說明寫的巴博薩大師卡洛斯利馬。

sentences.english: Joseph of Arimathea was a member of the Sanhedrin that convicted Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 亞利馬太的約瑟是給耶穌定罪的公會成員之一。

sentences.english: Jesus is buried in Joseph of Arimathea's tomb.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌被葬在亞利馬太人約瑟的墓穴裏。

sentences.english: Agua Dulce (Sweet Water) is oneof the most popular beaches in Lima's Green Coast.
sentences.chinese: 甜蜜泉海灘是利馬綠色海岸線上最受歡迎的海灘之一。

sentences.english: The town is about 370 miles (600 km) southeast of Lima, the capital.
sentences.chinese: 科拉科拉位於首都利馬東南方向600公里處。

sentences.english: Carlos Barbosa-Lima was born in 1944 inSão Paulo, Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 卡洛斯巴博薩，利馬出生於1944年在巴西聖保羅。

sentences.english: The scientists were Jerry Merryman , James Van Tassel and Jack Kilby.
sentences.chinese: 這些科學家是傑利馬瑞曼，詹姆斯範塔索和傑克基拜。

pinyin: Gang1 guo3 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: St Paul/São Paulo, city in Brazil
